Godot Wild Jam 52 Entry with the Theme "Ghosts"


Iro and the ghost forest

You play as the wolf Iro against ghosts to collect ectoplasma, strengthen yourself, activating the crystals and finally beat the ghost of ghosts.


Controls:

Keyboard and Mouse:

W/S + Mouse to move
Space to attack
E/D to interact

Gamepad:

Joystick to move
Square/X/Y to attack
Cross/A/B to interact


Team:

Ryokugin (Game Direction and Development)
Xandruher (3D/2D Art and Animations)
Adrien Place (Sound and Music)
